attributes.action: Abolish the 2p Fuel Duty Price Rise in April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government has planned an increase of 2p per litre on fuel duty from April 2008. Prices are already high enough, and the extra 2p per litre will hit individuals even harder, not to mention how damaging such increases will be to business.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
